about.title: About Sweethome
about.description1: Sweethome was established in 2020 with the desire to bring high-quality handcrafted ice cream flavors to customers. We believe that each ice cream is not just a dessert, but a memorable experience.
about.description2: At Sweethome, we only use the freshest ingredients, combined with unique recipes developed by our experienced chefs.
about.description3: Our friendly and enthusiastic staff are always ready to serve you with a smile and professionalism in every detail.

howItsMade.description1: Our ice cream starts with the best ingredients, beginning with fresh milk from daily dairy farms. Every morning, we select the best milk to become an essential part of our sweet treats.
howItsMade.description2: Using traditional methods passed down from generation to generation, we transform the finest ingredients into smooth, creamy, rich ice cream.
howItsMade.description3: Quality and attention to detail are at the center of everything we do.

products.description1: Each soft ice cream piece is wrapped in a crunchy cone. When you bite into it, you hear the 'crunch' sound, and then the ice cream melts instantly, releasing the natural vanilla flavor.
products.description2: Each ice cream bar is a 'touch' of refreshment: red strawberry, golden pineapple, or sour lime. Small and convenient, just 'peel - bite - feel', and you've already quenched your thirst and added natural energy to every movement.
products.description3: The large ice cream box has a large volume, creamy soft ice cream mixed with caramel sauce, roasted almond and chocolate chips. Scoop each spoonful, place it on a waffle, pancakes, or mix with fruit - the whole family will have a perfect dessert in no time.
